explains: vi. 反叛；暴动；参加叛乱

sentences.en: Mutiny was effectually laid to rest for the moment.
sentences.cn: 叛乱暂时有效地平息了。

sentences.en: We have a family mutiny on our hands!
sentences.cn: 我们家出了叛逆，需要处理。

sentences.en: Discontent among the ship's crew finally led to the outbreak of mutiny.
sentences.cn: 船员的不满情绪最终酿成了暴乱。
